website_summaries.verdict: Though it may not cut all types of pills perfectly, this model earns high marks for the sturdy construction and value price.
pros: Straightforward mechanism that's easy to use
Can be cleaned in the dishwasher
cons: A few users gripe about it not producing clean cuts on all types of pills

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: A nice, solid piece of work. Sturdy enough to split a large tablet evenly and cleanly, equally good for small tablets. I've been using one for a number of years now. Bought one as a spare but it's still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Catmandu

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not always accurate in splitting.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t always split round pills exactly in half. You have to use a bit of care to get close to cutting in half. Not a bad item though and is convenient to carry split pills.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlb

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Leaves powder underneath it. Pretty bad accuracy, especially over time. Often would break my pill into three instead of two pieces.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: pill splitter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compact pill splitter. Pretty sturdy for the price. You get even splits every time.

customer_reviews.title: Crushes
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cut pills evenly it crushes one side on thicker pills.
